text_blocks.content: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 741 Filed 08/10/22 Page 14 of 106 LBTVMAX1 18

(In open court) MS. STERNHEIM: Judge? THE COURT: Just a moment. Yes, Ms. Sternheim. MS. STERNHEIM: I'm just inquiring if that format was satisfactory to the Court. THE COURT: I think so. MS. STERNHEIM: Thank you. THE COURT: I think the information I'm getting is that we're missing three jurors who are not yet accounted for on the security line. (Pause) THE COURT: Current status is we're missing one juror from the fifth floor, and two from the first floor. I think we'll give it five more minutes and then I'll move one juror from the first floor to the fifth floor, unless counsel has concerns with that. And I'm not going to tell you who the juror is yet. MS. COMEY: Your Honor, we would just ask whether the Court has attempted to call the missing jurors. THE COURT: That's happening now. MS. COMEY: Thank you, your Honor. (Pause) (Continued on next page)
